Module software1.software1
Package software1.software1

Class MainMenuController

java.lang.Object
software1.software1.MainMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainMenuController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controls user functions for the Main Menu of the application. Allows users to add, modify, and delete Parts and Products.

    • onActionModifyPart

      void onActionModifyPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException

      Parameters:
      event - An ActionEvent.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionDeletePart

      void onActionDeletePart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Removes a part from the application inventory. Allows the user to confirm prior to deletion. Notifies the user if a part has not been selected.
      Parameters:
      event - An ActionEvent.

    • onPartSearch

      void onPartSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Locates a part within the application inventory using search criteria. Alerts the user if no results were found.
      Parameters:
      event - An ActionEvent.

    • onProductSearch

      void onProductSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Locates a product within the application inventory using search criteria. Alerts the user if no results were found.
      Parameters:
      event - An ActionEvent.

    • onActionAddProduct

      Parameters:
      event - An ActionEvent.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionModifyProduct

      void onActionModifyProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Directs user to the Modify Product form. Allows the user to modify values for a specific product. Alerts user if no product was previously selected.
      Parameters:
      event - An ActionEvent.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionDeleteProduct

      void onActionDeleteProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Allows the user to remove a product from the application inventory. NOTE: Products may not be removed if they have any parts associated with them. Alerts user if a product has not be selected, or if there are parts still associated with a product.
      Parameters:
      event - An ActionEvent.

    • onActionExit

      void onActionExit(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Exits the application.
      Parameters:
      event - An ActionEvent.

      Displays a list of parts available with the application inventory.
      Parameters:
      parts - The list of parts to be displayed in the TableView.

    • setProductTableView

      private void setProductTableView(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> products)
      Display a list of a products available within the application inventory.
      Parameters:
      products - The list of products to be displayed in the TableView.
